comments.body: Nope. You gotta manage with what you have.
No, but the booklet is around 45 pages I think and I've nvr seen someone even come close to finishing it. You'll be fine
When we had our last esa it was only 37 pages, and for maths I know people ran out of pages so they had to type the answers too
Ohh yeah I forgot it's this hybrid mode thing now. Yeah, ig you'll have to manage
Yes many pages had graph etc and weren't usable.
